trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 연결에 대 한 변경 된 인수를 포함 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: 이 대리자에 의해 지원 되는 연결 된 이벤트 포함에서 제공 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>클래스와 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"> </xref> 지정 된 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 클래스에 대 한 초기 값으로.

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결 된 입력된 장치입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 이 이벤트와 연결 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 연결 된 텍스트를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결 된 모든 컨트롤 텍스트를 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 시스템 효율성을 높일 수 있는 형식별 방법으로 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현와으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>다음 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> 제네릭 처리기 캐스팅

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 패턴 및는 이유에 대 한 내용은 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>및 [라우트된 이벤트 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
The target to call the handler on.
Gets system text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 시스템 텍스트를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결 된 모든 시스템 텍스트를 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 입력에 연결 된 텍스트를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결 된 입력된 텍스트를 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 이 이벤트와 연결 된 텍스트 컴퍼지션을 포함 하는 개체입니다.
